metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6673 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in Decoder.cpp in libpgf before 6.15.32.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6673` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpgf6 - 6.14.12-3.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libpgf package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.14.12-3.2').
